snippet: Bolton Wanderers chairman Phil Gartside, who was also on the board of the Football Association, has died of cancer at the age of 63....

headline.main: Bolton Wanderers Chairman Gartside Dies at 63
headline.print_headline: Bolton Wanderers Chairman Gartside Dies at 63

lead_paragraph: Bolton Wanderers chairman Phil Gartside, who was also on the board of the Football Association, has died of cancer at the age of 63.

snippet: Arsenal's England midfielder Jack Wilshere, who has suffered a string of injuries, has joined Bournemouth on a season-long loan, the Premier League clubs said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Arsenal's Wilshere Joins Bournemouth on Loan
headline.print_headline: Arsenal's Wilshere Joins Bournemouth on Loan

lead_paragraph: Arsenal's England midfielder Jack Wilshere, who has suffered a string of injuries, has joined Bournemouth on a season-long loan, the Premier League clubs said on Wednesday.

snippet: Southampton have signed attacking midfielder Sofiane Boufal from Ligue 1 side Lille on a five-year contract for a club-record fee, the Premier League club said on Monday....

headline.main: Southampton Sign Boufal for Club-Record Fee
headline.print_headline: Southampton Sign Boufal for Club-Record Fee

lead_paragraph: Southampton have signed attacking midfielder Sofiane Boufal from Ligue 1 side Lille on a five-year contract for a club-record fee, the Premier League club said on Monday.

snippet: Attacking midfielder Jose Manuel Jurado has left English Premier League side Watford for Spain's Espanyol, where he will reunite with former manager Quique Sanchez Flores....

headline.main: Midfielder Jurado Swaps Watford for Spanish Side Espanyol
headline.print_headline: Midfielder Jurado Swaps Watford for Spanish Side Espanyol

lead_paragraph: Attacking midfielder Jose Manuel Jurado has left English Premier League side Watford for Spain's Espanyol, where he will reunite with former manager Quique Sanchez Flores.

snippet: Southampton have completed the signing of England under-21 winger Nathan Redmond from relegated Norwich City on a five-year deal, the currently managerless Premier League side said on Saturday....

headline.main: Southampton Sign Redmond From Norwich City
headline.print_headline: Southampton Sign Redmond From Norwich City

lead_paragraph: Southampton have completed the signing of England under-21 winger Nathan Redmond from relegated Norwich City on a five-year deal, the currently managerless Premier League side said on Saturday.

snippet: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy's lack of experience at major international tournaments means he will not be an automatic starter for England at Euro 2016, Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger has said....

headline.main: Inexperience May Cost Vardy Euro 2016 Starting Spot-Wenger
headline.print_headline: Inexperience May Cost Vardy Euro 2016 Starting Spot-Wenger

lead_paragraph: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy's lack of experience at major international tournaments means he will not be an automatic starter for England at Euro 2016, Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger has said.

snippet: Bournemouth made a 38.33 million pound ($56.3 million) loss as staff wages jumped about 76 percent to 30.4 million pounds, according to the club's accounts for the Championship-winning 2014-15 season that saw them promoted to the Premier League....

headline.main: Cherries Continue to Turn Red as Salaries Rise
headline.print_headline: Cherries Continue to Turn Red as Salaries Rise

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth made a 38.33 million pound ($56.3 million) loss as staff wages jumped about 76 percent to 30.4 million pounds, according to the club's accounts for the Championship-winning 2014-15 season that saw them promoted to the Premier League.

snippet: Manager Arsene Wenger has urged Arsenal to "put things right" when they take on Southampton on Tuesday by avenging the 4-0 loss they suffered at St Mary's Stadium on Boxing Day....

headline.main: Wenger Out to Settle a Score as Arsenal Take on Southampton
headline.print_headline: Wenger Out to Settle a Score as Arsenal Take on Southampton

lead_paragraph: Manager Arsene Wenger has urged Arsenal to "put things right" when they take on Southampton on Tuesday by avenging the 4-0 loss they suffered at St Mary's Stadium on Boxing Day.

snippet: Arsenal left back Nacho Monreal has extended his contract with the Premier League leaders, the London club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Left Back Monreal Extends Contract With Arsenal
headline.print_headline: Left Back Monreal Extends Contract With Arsenal

lead_paragraph: Arsenal left back Nacho Monreal has extended his contract with the Premier League leaders, the London club said on Tuesday.

snippet: Steve Bruce appears set to continue as Hull City manager after the 55-year-old said he was fully focussed on preparing the club for the Premier League season....

headline.main: Bruce Set to Carry On as Hull City Manager
headline.print_headline: Bruce Set to Carry On as Hull City Manager

lead_paragraph: Steve Bruce appears set to continue as Hull City manager after the 55-year-old said he was fully focussed on preparing the club for the Premier League season.
